mapper.sql: c.Id, c.UniqueID, c.OrgName, c.QualificationTypeID, c.QualificationLevelID, date_format(c.EffectiveBeginDate, '%Y-%m-%d') EffectiveBeginDate , date_format(c.EffectiveEndDate, '%Y-%m-%d') EffectiveEndDate , CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,c.EffectiveBeginDate,c.EffectiveEndDate),'å¤©' )effectiveTime, c.CertificateNo, c.CertificatePhoto, c.Memo, c.IsDelete, date_format(c.CreateTime, '%Y-%m-%d') CreateTime ,date_format(c.UpdateTime, '%Y-%m-%d') UpdateTime , c.FileUrl, b.codename typeName, e.codename levelName
mapper.select:
select
from bm2_keepsecretqualificationstatistic_tbl c left join basecode b on b.id = c.QualificationTypeID left join basecode e on e.id = c.QualificationLevelID where c.UniqueID = #{id}
mapper.delete: update bm2_keepsecretqualificationstatistic_tbl set IsDelete = 1 where UniqueID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into bm2_keepsecretqualificationstatistic_tbl (Id, UniqueID, OrgName, QualificationTypeID, QualificationLevelID, EffectiveBeginDate, EffectiveEndDate, CertificateNo, CertificatePhoto, Memo, IsDelete, CreateTime, UpdateTime, FileUrl) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uniqueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualificationtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualificationlevelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str_to_date(#{effectivebegindate},'%Y-%m-%d') ,str_to_date(#{effectiveenddate},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{certificateno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificatephoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, NOW(), NOW(), #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bm2_keepsecretqualificationstatistic_tbl set OrgName = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QualificationTypeID = #{qualificationtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QualificationLevelID = #{qualificationlevelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EffectiveBeginDate = #{effectivebegindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EffectiveEndDate = #{effectiveenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CertificateNo = #{certificateno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CertificatePhoto = #{certificatephoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = str_to_date(#{createtime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), UpdateTime = NOW(), FileUrl = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UniqueID = #{uniqueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
